ygData.subject: Re: Women on EQ: Are you a girl in RL?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hahaha!  I ve been asked that several times as well and I have a great answer for it.  I always say, are you blind?  Do I look like a boy to you?  This
ygData.messageBody:
Hahaha! I've been asked that several times as well and I have a great
answer for it. I always say, "are you blind? Do I look like a boy to
you?" This response is in the context of my character who is, as I've
said, a bard. Genneth LOVES to tease and poke fun, so she makes
comments like this and uses ROFL all the time. Then I usually give a
tell to say YES I AM a woman (note not girl) in real life. And I go on
to explain that I've been playing these kind of games since I was very
young.

Heather/ Genneth

--- Mystyrain8@... wrote:
> From: Mystyrain8@...
>
> Hello All,
>
> I wanted to jump in on this topic and introduce
> myself at the same time. My
> name is Mystyrain and Im a 17th (almost 18th) level
> Magician on Cazic-Thule.
> I have never found flirting to be a real problem,
> though there are some guys
> that are extremely crass about it. Most of them
> flirt in fun.
>
> I have been fairly lucky, I managed to find a
> wonderful Monk to concentrate
> my "serious" flirting on and now we are engaged to
> be married. There is
> still a lot of non-serious flirting that goes on but
> everyone is pretty much
> aware that Im taken now.
>
> What i get a lot of is, "Are you a girl IRL?". As
> if that makes a
> difference. I always have to laugh at that one.
> Some guys find it so hard
> to believe that women actually LIKE these kinds of
> games too.
>
> In Light,
>
> Mystyrain
>
>
